content.text:
# Draft:1937–38 Queens Park Rangers F.C. season

The 1937–38 Queens Park Rangers season was the club's 47th season of existence and their 18th season in the Football League Third Division. QPR finished 3rd in the league, and were eliminated in the second round of the FA Cup.
League standings
Results
QPR scores given first
